pr_title: [risk=no][RW-5723] Decrease notebook iFrame width to fit navbar

timeline.message: Decrease notebook iFrame width to fit navbar

timeline.bodyText: The scrollbar width is unlikely to be consistent across browser / OS, but this may look fine anyways. If you can push up a demo server I can check how it looks on Linux / Windows
timeline.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: Oh - sorry. This is to fit the help sidebar. Nice. LGTM then (please add a comment)
replies.author: calbach
